QuestData.Title: The Fates Bless Us
QuestData.Description:
We are able to procure a valuable item to help you in our war against the Legion. This Seal can be used at the most opportune moments to grant another chance at destiny.
Shall we procure one for you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Place a work order for a Seal of Broken Fate.

Objectives.Objective: Place a work order for a Seal of Broken Fate
